summary: A white car suddenly appears from a blind spot on the right side of the road, aggressively cutting into the main traffic lane directly in front of the dashcam vehicle, creating a dangerous situation.
actions: The dashcam vehicle is driving straight on a two-lane road. A white car emerges from a side road/driveway on the right and attempts to turn left or cross the main road, cutting off the dashcam vehicle.
characters: Driver of the dashcam vehicle (implied, autonomous system), driver of the white car.
key_objects: Dashcam vehicle, white car, main road, side road/intersection, roadside buildings and trees (creating blind spot).
key_actions: Ghost probing detected. The white car performs a dangerous cut-in maneuver, appearing abruptly from behind roadside obstructions and entering the path of the dashcam vehicle without sufficient clearance.
next_action: The autonomous driving system would likely initiate an emergency braking maneuver or evasive steering to avoid a collision with the white car. The white car would continue its turn/crossing.
